title: miners include uncles in the pending block only 50% of the time
body: #### System information Version: 1.5.0-unstable-4f4e1026 #### Expected behaviour Miners should include uncle blocks in the pending block (i.e. the block that they are currently mining) immediately. As soon as an uncle block is received, the pending block should be updated to include it. #### Actual behaviour Miners only include uncles in the pending block 50% of the time, depending on the outcome of the coin flip on [core/blockchain.go#L784](https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/4f4e1026f50860b05a61fe4b5d53d6933f62f549/core/blockchain.go#L784). If the coin flip is less than 0.5, then the pending block is updated to include the uncle block, and will thus be included in the first mined block. But if the coin flip is greater than 0.5, then the pending block is not updated, and the uncle will not be included until the second mined block. #### Steps to reproduce the behaviour The following logs were produced by adding additional debug prints to [core/blockchain.go and miner/worker.go](https://gist.github.com/cdetrio/20ff720929e1c599ef0aeed8c872ce72): ``` ### Correct behavior: two blocks at #2054709 are received and coin flip < 0.5, so ChainHeadEvent is triggered. ### second block at #2054709 is included as an uncle in #2054710 I0811 18:01:05.897392 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 5 txs in 21.403651ms. #2054708 [071245a2 / 071245a2] I0811 18:01:05.897465 core/blockchain.go:1128] postChainEvents recieved ChainEvent. check if event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. I0811 18:01:05.897474 core/blockchain.go:1131] event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. posting ChainHeadEvent to eventMux. I0811 18:01:05.897519 miner/worker.go:238] update() received ChainHeadEvent with block #2054708 and hash 071245a2 and uncle count 0 I0811 18:01:05.897544 miner/worker.go:242] update() case ChainHeadEvent. invoking commitNewWork. I0811 18:01:05.897554 miner/worker.go:468] commitNewWork() I0811 18:01:05.898777 miner/worker.go:564] commitNewWork() invoking work.commitTransactions(). I0811 18:01:05.915772 miner/worker.go:606] commit new work on block 2054709 with 7 txs & 0 uncles. Took 18.200835ms I0811 18:01:12.385265 core/blockchain.go:781] writeBlock local #2054708 and localTd =46983730762903655215 I0811 18:01:12.385301 core/blockchain.go:782] writeBlock new #2054709 and externTd =46983791208037428369 I0811 18:01:12.385967 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 7 txs in 15.370078ms. #2054709 [c7e749bc / c7e749bc] I0811 18:01:12.386045 core/blockchain.go:1128] postChainEvents recieved ChainEvent. check if event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. I0811 18:01:12.386056 core/blockchain.go:1131] event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. posting ChainHeadEvent to eventMux. I0811 18:01:12.386087 miner/worker.go:238] update() received ChainHeadEvent with block #2054709 and hash c7e749bc and uncle count 0 I0811 18:01:12.386104 miner/worker.go:242] update() case ChainHeadEvent. invoking commitNewWork. I0811 18:01:12.386113 miner/worker.go:468] commitNewWork() I0811 18:01:12.387161 miner/worker.go:564] commitNewWork() invoking work.commitTransactions(). I0811 18:01:12.395067 miner/worker.go:606] commit new work on block 2054710 with 4 txs & 0 uncles. Took 8.936108ms I0811 18:01:13.116346 core/blockchain.go:781] writeBlock local #2054709 and localTd =46983791208037428369 I0811 18:01:13.116380 core/blockchain.go:782] writeBlock new #2054709 and externTd =46983791208037428369 I0811 18:01:13.116396 core/blockchain.go:793] New block with same Td as head. coin flip < 0.5, so reorg and mine on new block (CanonStatTy). I0811 18:01:13.118955 miner/worker.go:246] update() received ChainSideEvent with block #2054709 and hash c7e749bc and uncle count 0 I0811 18:01:13.118990 miner/worker.go:252] update() case ChainSideEvent. adding to possibleUncles. (watch if this adds uncle to pending block?) I0811 18:01:13.119156 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 7 txs in 16.90164ms. #2054709 [d071a538 / d071a538] I0811 18:01:13.119225 core/blockchain.go:1128] postChainEvents recieved ChainEvent. check if event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. I0811 18:01:13.119239 core/blockchain.go:1131] event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. posting ChainHeadEvent to eventMux. I0811 18:01:13.119373 miner/worker.go:238] update() received ChainHeadEvent with block #2054709 and hash d071a538 and uncle count 0 I0811 18:01:13.119394 miner/worker.go:242] update() case ChainHeadEvent. invoking commitNewWork. I0811 18:01:13.119403 miner/worker.go:468] commitNewWork() I0811 18:01:13.119963 miner/worker.go:564] commitNewWork() invoking work.commitTransactions(). I0811 18:01:13.121971 miner/worker.go:578] commitNewWork() invoking self.commitUncle(). I0811 18:01:13.122534 miner/worker.go:606] commit new work on block 2054710 with 4 txs & 1 uncles. Took 3.11979ms I0811 18:01:23.461070 core/blockchain.go:781] writeBlock local #2054709 and localTd =46983791208037428369 I0811 18:01:23.461107 core/blockchain.go:782] writeBlock new #2054710 and externTd =46983851682685689142 I0811 18:01:23.461679 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 4 txs in 18.542585ms. #2054710 [6722764d / 6722764d] I0811 18:01:23.461764 core/blockchain.go:1128] postChainEvents recieved ChainEvent. check if event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. I0811 18:01:23.461785 core/blockchain.go:1131] event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. posting ChainHeadEvent to eventMux. I0811 18:01:23.461948 miner/worker.go:238] update() received ChainHeadEvent with block #2054710 and hash 6722764d and uncle count 1 I0811 18:01:23.461975 miner/worker.go:242] update() case ChainHeadEvent. invoking commitNewWork. I0811 18:01:23.461985 miner/worker.go:468] commitNewWork() I0811 18:01:23.462697 miner/worker.go:564] commitNewWork() invoking work.commitTransactions(). I0811 18:01:23.468093 miner/worker.go:578] commitNewWork() invoking self.commitUncle(). I0811 18:01:23.468329 miner/worker.go:606] commit new work on block 2054711 with 2 txs & 0 uncles. Took 6.33254ms I0811 18:01:59.844812 core/blockchain.go:781] writeBlock local #2054710 and localTd =46983851682685689142 I0811 18:01:59.844868 core/blockchain.go:782] writeBlock new #2054711 and externTd =46983912157334212059 I0811 18:01:59.845356 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 9.243652ms. #2054711 [eb21bcfc / eb21bcfc] ``` And here is an image from fork.ethstats.net of the correct behavior, where the miner includes the uncle in the first mined block: ``` ### Incorrect behavior: two blocks at #2054673 are received and coin flip >= 0.5, so ChainSideEvent is triggered. ### ChainSideEvent does not cause second block at #2054673 to be included as an uncle in the pending block at #2054674. ### block #2054674 is mined without uncles, and ChainHeadEvent is triggered. ### second block at #2054673 is then included as an uncle in block #2054675 I0811 17:52:47.079822 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 5 txs in 14.62979ms. #2054671 [6d59eadc / 6d59eadc] I0811 17:52:47.080216 core/blockchain.go:1128] postChainEvents recieved ChainEvent. check if event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. I0811 17:52:47.080236 core/blockchain.go:1131] event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. posting ChainHeadEvent to eventMux. I0811 17:52:47.080292 miner/worker.go:238] update() received ChainHeadEvent with block #2054671 and hash 6d59eadc and uncle count 0 I0811 17:52:47.080312 miner/worker.go:242] update() case ChainHeadEvent. invoking commitNewWork. I0811 17:52:47.080319 miner/worker.go:468] commitNewWork() I0811 17:52:47.081216 miner/worker.go:564] commitNewWork() invoking work.commitTransactions(). I0811 17:52:47.085980 miner/worker.go:606] commit new work on block 2054672 with 3 txs & 0 uncles. Took 5.643987ms I0811 17:52:57.231893 core/blockchain.go:781] writeBlock local #2054671 and localTd =46981494552902442411 I0811 17:52:57.231931 core/blockchain.go:782] writeBlock new #2054672 and externTd =46981554939314882778 I0811 17:52:57.232444 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 3 txs in 14.570402ms. #2054672 [397db507 / 397db507] I0811 17:52:57.232537 core/blockchain.go:1128] postChainEvents recieved ChainEvent. check if event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. I0811 17:52:57.232550 core/blockchain.go:1131] event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. posting ChainHeadEvent to eventMux. I0811 17:52:57.232941 miner/worker.go:238] update() received ChainHeadEvent with block #2054672 and hash 397db507 and uncle count 0 I0811 17:52:57.232976 miner/worker.go:242] update() case ChainHeadEvent. invoking commitNewWork. I0811 17:52:57.232984 miner/worker.go:468] commitNewWork() I0811 17:52:57.233881 miner/worker.go:564] commitNewWork() invoking work.commitTransactions(). I0811 17:52:57.237679 miner/worker.go:606] commit new work on block 2054673 with 2 txs & 0 uncles. Took 4.678644ms I0811 17:53:08.376302 core/blockchain.go:781] writeBlock local #2054672 and localTd =46981554939314882778 I0811 17:53:08.376351 core/blockchain.go:782] writeBlock new #2054673 and externTd =46981615325727585289 I0811 17:53:08.378241 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 2 txs in 10.775259ms. #2054673 [87077cac / 87077cac] I0811 17:53:08.378345 core/blockchain.go:1128] postChainEvents recieved ChainEvent. check if event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. I0811 17:53:08.378356 core/blockchain.go:1131] event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. posting ChainHeadEvent to eventMux. I0811 17:53:08.378495 miner/worker.go:238] update() received ChainHeadEvent with block #2054673 and hash 87077cac and uncle count 0 I0811 17:53:08.378522 miner/worker.go:242] update() case ChainHeadEvent. invoking commitNewWork. I0811 17:53:08.378530 miner/worker.go:468] commitNewWork() I0811 17:53:08.379877 miner/worker.go:564] commitNewWork() invoking work.commitTransactions(). I0811 17:53:08.390608 miner/worker.go:606] commit new work on block 2054674 with 6 txs & 0 uncles. Took 12.064027ms I0811 17:53:10.148106 core/blockchain.go:781] writeBlock local #2054673 and localTd =46981615325727585289 I0811 17:53:10.148140 core/blockchain.go:782] writeBlock new #2054673 and externTd =46981615325727585289 I0811 17:53:10.148152 core/blockchain.go:806] New block with same Td as head. coin flip >= 0.5, so continue mining on old block (SideStatTy). I0811 17:53:10.148272 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 2 txs in 12.940696ms. #2054673 [305cb118 / 305cb118] I0811 17:53:10.148361 miner/worker.go:246] update() received ChainSideEvent with block #2054673 and hash 305cb118 and uncle count 0 I0811 17:53:10.148481 miner/worker.go:252] update() case ChainSideEvent. adding to possibleUncles. (watch if this adds uncle to pending block?) I0811 17:53:14.834968 core/blockchain.go:781] writeBlock local #2054673 and localTd =46981615325727585289 I0811 17:53:14.835007 core/blockchain.go:782] writeBlock new #2054674 and externTd =46981675741626103021 I0811 17:53:14.835894 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 5 txs in 20.462214ms. #2054674 [04edac42 / 04edac42] I0811 17:53:14.835969 core/blockchain.go:1128] postChainEvents recieved ChainEvent. check if event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. I0811 17:53:14.835978 core/blockchain.go:1131] event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. posting ChainHeadEvent to eventMux. I0811 17:53:14.837976 miner/worker.go:238] update() received ChainHeadEvent with block #2054674 and hash 04edac42 and uncle count 0 I0811 17:53:14.838097 miner/worker.go:242] update() case ChainHeadEvent. invoking commitNewWork. I0811 17:53:14.838106 miner/worker.go:468] commitNewWork() I0811 17:53:14.838918 miner/worker.go:564] commitNewWork() invoking work.commitTransactions(). I0811 17:53:14.844058 miner/worker.go:578] commitNewWork() invoking self.commitUncle(). I0811 17:53:14.844725 miner/worker.go:606] commit new work on block 2054675 with 3 txs & 1 uncles. Took 6.604205ms I0811 17:53:40.185965 core/blockchain.go:781] writeBlock local #2054674 and localTd =46981675741626103021 I0811 17:53:40.186005 core/blockchain.go:782] writeBlock new #2054675 and externTd =46981736187024833345 I0811 17:53:40.187578 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 2 txs in 19.874714ms. #2054675 [b9d29a72 / b9d29a72] I0811 17:53:40.187681 core/blockchain.go:1128] postChainEvents recieved ChainEvent. check if event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. I0811 17:53:40.187700 core/blockchain.go:1131] event.Hash == self.LastBlockHash. posting ChainHeadEvent to eventMux. I0811 17:53:40.188712 miner/worker.go:238] update() received ChainHeadEvent with block #2054675 and hash b9d29a72 and uncle count 1 I0811 17:53:40.188745 miner/worker.go:242] update() case ChainHeadEvent. invoking commitNewWork. I0811 17:53:40.188754 miner/worker.go:468] commitNewWork() I0811 17:53:40.189206 miner/worker.go:564] commitNewWork() invoking work.commitTransactions(). I0811 17:53:40.259652 miner/worker.go:578] commitNewWork() invoking self.commitUncle(). I0811 17:53:40.260912 miner/worker.go:606] commit new work on block 2054676 with 7 txs & 0 uncles. Took 72.141124ms I0811 17:53:47.791146 core/blockchain.go:781] writeBlock local #2054675 and localTd =46981736187024833345 I0811 17:53:47.791180 core/blockchain.go:782] writeBlock new #2054676 and externTd =46981796602909470965 I0811 17:53:47.791790 core/blockchain.go:988] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 7 txs in 29.68424ms. #2054676 [4e2e618c / 4e2e618c] ``` And an image of the incorrect behavior, where the uncle is not included until the second mined block: EDIT: Note that since I was not the miner of the blocks in question, the correspondence between correct/incorrect behavior in my local log files and the fork.ethstats.net images is a convenient coincidence (it just so happened that the coin flips on my local node had, presumably, the same outcome as the coin flips of the actual miners).
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
